thread.title: Of Course Netflix Just Dropped a New House of Cards Promo on Inauguration Day
thread.title_full: Of Course Netflix Just Dropped a New House of Cards Promo on Inauguration Day

title: Of Course Netflix Just Dropped a New House of Cards Promo on Inauguration Day
text:
Of Course Netflix Just Dropped a New House of Cards Promo on Inauguration Day 
Interesting. By Kate Storey Jan 20, 2017 Of all the times to release a promo for the new season of House of Cards , Netflix picked, well, today. Minutes before Donald Trump's inauguration, in fact. The political drama's Twitter account posted the video, featuring kids' voices reciting the Pledge of Allegiance while panning out on an upside-down American flag. It's then revealed that Season 5 of the show will return on May 30. The video is captioned: "We make the terror," which are the final words ruthless President Frank Underwood (played by Kevin Spacey) uttered in the last season. We make the terror. pic.twitter.com/VpChwGOSMj 
â€” House of Cards (@HouseofCards) January 20, 2017
